value.title: User Saved Templates | Drush Site-Install
value.description:
Test instructions for user templates:


<

body.value:
Test instructions for user templates:


  • Click the disk icon on the Well element in the left column
  • Enter a template name, for example "Test 1"

A green message box confirming the template is saved should appear in the top right corner of your browser.

  • Click the + icon in the right column
  • Click the "Saved templates" tab
  • Select the template you named in Step 2

Check that the left and right column are identical.

Check that inline editing works right away on the text element in the right column.

Lorem ipsum.

Consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

A Life On Our Planet.

This should be compulsory viewing for all children and adults alike. pic.twitter.com/1gf9YZGf05

— David Attenborough (@AttenboroughSir) October 6, 2020
